fields.name: Curse of the Hellsblade
fields.description: You find a wondrous sword of black metal, only to find out that it is cursed! Now, you must find a way to contain this demon blade before it destroys everyone you meet!
fields.intro_text:
It happened one day that you chanced upon a wondrous sword of black metal.  This sword had a marvelous edge that did not dull, and it sang eerie melodies as you tested its edge against nearby saplings.

But hold!  You cannot put the sword down!  Try as you might, your hand will not let go of the hilt!  The most you can manage is to pass it to your left hand, thus freeing up your sword arm for other weapons.

Later that same day, you met up with a small band of companions, and showed them your new-found dilemma.  One of the band who had some knowledge of such swords, told you that he recognized it as a weapon of Hell, and told you of a cave that is reputed to hold the key to lift its curse.

You listened closely as he told you how to find it.  Perhaps you can find the answers to your problem there.  Still, it is a marvelous sword, and you could do worse than be saddled with such an obviously magical blade.  Your friends watched with interest as you readied it and prepared to demonstrate its edge on a nearby tree limb.

---

As you took aim at the limb, the sword began its strange song.  You felt a tremendous surge of strength flow into your arm as you severed a 6-inch limb with one blow!  And then, even before you knew what was happening, you swung about, and you watched in horror as the sword slew all of your friends!  Its song grew deeper and stronger as it tasted the blood of each.

Even though you struggled with all your might, you could not control your body until all were slain!  The sword pulsed with power, and seemed to be chuckling to itself.

You realized then that this blade is more than just cursed, but must in fact be possessed by a demon.  And if that wasn't bad enough, you had a great deal of difficulty getting the black sword to let go of your sword hand so that you could transfer it to your left one.

It's clear that the sword is stronger than you, and if it drinks much more blood it will control you completely.  Apart from that, it simply won't do to go about slaying everyone that you meet.  Without a doubt, you must find that cave and rid yourself of the Curse of the Hellsblade!

fields.name: You are outside a cave. (E/W)
fields.description: You may enter the cave by proceeding west. The road back to the Main Hall is to the east. Over the entrance is a scratched warning in the rock: "BEWARE THE HELLSBLADE!"

fields.name: You are in a narrow tunnel. (E/W)
fields.description: You are in an east/west tunnel. The cave entrance is to the east and to the west the tunnel gets darker.

fields.name: You are in a narrow tunnel. (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are in an east/west tunnel. To the west the tunnel continues. The entrance is to the east in the distance. There's a small chamber to the north.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the tunnel. (S/E)
fields.description: You may go south or east here. The tunnel to the south is extremely dark.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: There are doors to the east and west. A foul smell seems to be coming from one or both of the doors.

fields.name: You are in the Bat Cave. (E)
fields.description: You are standing in a very smelly room. Looking around you see the cause of the foul smell. There are hundreds of bats hanging from the ceiling. Piles of bat dung cover the floor! Yecch!

fields.name: You are in a slimy east chamber. (W)
fields.description: The walls and floor are slimy and wet here. There is rancid water standing on the floor. The exit is to the west.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel.
fields.description: You are in a dark north/south tunnel. There is a change in the tunnel to the south, but you can't tell what it is.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You may go north, west or east from here. The east/west tunnel is slightly narrower than the one to the north. A dark shadow on the south wall nearly covers a secret door that somebody forgot to close.

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel. (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable east/west tunnel. There is a room to the north.

fields.name: You are in a small north chamber. (S)
fields.description: You are in a dusty chamber with dirt and hair all over the floor. The place looks like a dog has been living here!

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel.
fields.description: There is some light in this portion of the tunnel, but you cannot tell where it is coming from. There is an intersection to the east.

fields.name: You are at a four-way intersection. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a four-way intersection in the tunnel. The tunnel to the north appears to be freshly dug.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel. (N/S/E)
fields.description: The walls of the tunnel look like they have just recently been chipped out of the rock. There is a chamber to the east.

fields.name: You are at a dead end in the tunnel. (S)
fields.description: You are at a widening in the tunnel. The tunnel ends here, and there is a lot of chipped rock, dust and rubble strewn about.

fields.name: You are in a rough stone room. (W)
fields.description: There is a lot of rubble from the chipped walls all over the place. There are stones big enough to sit on in here.

fields.name: You are in a rough tunnel. (S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a rough east/west tunnel. To the south is a doorway with blood on the floor and marks from something that was dragged into the room. There is also a room to the east.

fields.name: You are in a small dark room. (W)
fields.description: The walls are non-reflective here so you cannot see any details. The only exit is to the west.

fields.name: You are in a dark walled room. (N)
fields.description: You are in a room with dark walls. They appear to be covered with soot and ash. The only exit is to the north.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel. (N/S/W)
fields.description: There is a door to the west and another to the south.

fields.name: You are in a small closet. (E)
fields.description: You are in a small storage closet. There are hooks on the walls for hanging up clothes and such. The only exit is to the east.

fields.name: You are in a large cavernous room. (N)
fields.description: You are in a large cavern with very high ceilings. The walls and floor are a hard quartz-type material. There are chewed bones scattered on the floor. The only exit is to the north.

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel.
fields.description: You are in a tunnel running east and west. There are intersections in both directions, but in the dim light you cannot make out any details.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection. (N/S/E)
fields.description: You are at a north/south by east T-intersection in the tunnel. The tunnel to the south leads into a large bedroom.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel. (N/S/W)
fields.description: There is a doorway to the west leading into a large chamber.

fields.name: You are in a small dry chamber. (E)
fields.description: There are torches bolted to the walls giving off a warm light. There are cave type drawings on the wall in here and a few bones lying in the corner. The only way out is to the east.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection. (S/E/W)
fields.description: You are at the north end of a north/south tunnel with large caverns to the east and west. The rock around here is mostly limestone with some adventurers' initials carved into it.

fields.name: You are in a large cavern. (W)
fields.description: You are in a large cavern that has stalactites and stalagmites all over the room. You cannot see how large the room is, as your vision is blocked by the roughness of the floor. The only door you can see from here is to the west.

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel. (N/E/W)
fields.description: A dimly lit doorway is to the north. A foul odor seems to come from it. To the west you can make out some kind of intersection.

fields.name: You are in a small wizard's chamber. (S)
fields.description: The walls are covered with strange markings of old spells and formulas. There are a bunch of miscellaneous wizard supplies in a cabinet on the north wall. The only exit is to the south.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection. (N/S/E)
fields.description: You are at a north, south and east T-intersection. The walls are smooth and even. To the south is a long dark tunnel with rather spooky atmosphere.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel. (N/S/W)
fields.description: There is a chamber to the west that some very pleasant odors are escaping from. Seems to be some kind of perfume.

fields.name: You are in a dining chamber. (S)
fields.description: You are in a large dining chamber. There are piles of turkey bones scattered on the floor, and the place smells of rancid grease. There is a large sturdy table in the middle of the room. The only exit is to the south.

fields.name: You are in a ladies bed chamber. (E)
fields.description: The bed is a beautiful canopy-topped bed with a pink veil around it. There is a white chest of drawers and other furnishings also. The only exit is to the east.

fields.name: You are in a man's bedroom. (N)
fields.description: You are in a large room that serves as a bedroom for some wealthy warrior type. It is apparent he is a warrior type from the collection of heads mounted on the wall. The only exit is to the north.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel. (N/S/E)
fields.description: There is a chamber to the east. To the south there is some kind of intersection.

fields.name: You are in a dusty chamber. (W)
fields.description: You are in a dusty chamber with only one way out.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection. (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a unremarkable T-intersection. Tunnels lead east, west and north.

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel. (N/E/W)
fields.description: There is a chamber to the north and another to the west.

fields.name: You are in a large north chamber. (S)
fields.description: You are in a large chamber with the only door to the south. The room has numerous footprints and scuffling marks on the soft dirt floor.

fields.name: You are in a large cavern with a pool. (E/D)
fields.description: You are in a large cavern. There is a large pool of water here that you may swim in if you climb down into it. The only exit is to the east. The water glows with a dim phosphorescence that is just barely enough to see by.

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel. (S/E/W)
fields.description: To the south is a chamber. To the east is also a chamber.

fields.name: You are in a small chamber. (N/S)
fields.description: You are in a small chamber with a few ashes on the floor where a fire was once built. The south wall is concealed in shadow.

fields.name: You are in a large chamber. (W)
fields.description: You are in a plain brown stone chamber. It is nice and dry and the walls are an ugly brownish color. West is the only exit.

fields.name: You are in a large cavern. (N/E/D)
fields.description: You are in a large cavern that has stalactites and stalagmites all over the room. You cannot see how large the room is, as your vision is blocked by the roughness of the floor. You may move north or east within the room. There is a pool of water on the floor here, just big enough to swim in.

fields.name: You are in a large cavern. (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a large cavern that has stalactites and stalagmites all over the room. You cannot see how large the room is, as your vision is blocked by the roughness of the floor. You may move north or west in the room. A tunnel leads east.

fields.name: You are in a large cavern. (S/W)
fields.description: You are in a large cavern that has many stalactites and stalagmites all over the room. You cannot see how large the room is, as your vision is blocked by the roughness of the floor. You may move south or west within the room.

fields.name: You are in a large cavern. (S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a large cavern that has stalactites and stalagmites all over the room. You cannot see how large the room is, as your vision is blocked by the roughness of the floor. You may move south or east within the room. A tunnel leads west.

fields.name: You are in a very large pool. (U/D)
fields.description: You are in a very large pool of water. The water is too deep to touch bottom. You may climb up out of the pool, or go under the surface.

fields.name: You are under the surface of a pool. (U/D)
fields.description: You are under the surface of a pool of water. There is not very much light in here, but you can see a little. You may swim up to the surface or go deeper into the water.

fields.name: You are in a very large pool. (U/D)
fields.description: You are in a very large pool of water. The water is too deep to touch bottom. You may climb up out of the pool, or go under the surface.

fields.name: You are at the bottom of the pool. (U/D)
fields.description: There is a very deep crevice here that you can not see to the bottom of. You may swim up to the surface or down into the crack in the bottom of the pool.

fields.name: You are in the large crevice underwater. (W/U/D)
fields.description: You have swam into the crevice. It continues downward past a dark overhang to the west. But the pressure from the depth is already crushing -- You would be foolish to dive deeper.

fields.name: You are in a secret tunnel. (E/W)
fields.description: You are in an east/west tunnel. The west end of the tunnel has partially collapsed, and is filled with rubble.

fields.name: You are in a secret tunnel. (N/S)
fields.description: You are in a secret north/south tunnel. To the south there is a dingy little chamber with cobwebs and debris hanging across the doorway.

fields.name: You are in a dingy dirty chamber. (N/S/W)
fields.description: You are in a dingy, dirty little chamber with cobwebs and dust covering the walls and floor.

fields.name: You are in a small dark closet. (E)
fields.description: There is no light in the little room and the roof is slowly caving in. The only exit is to the east.

fields.name: You are in a small secret chamber. (E)
fields.description: You are in a small dry chamber. Dirt is piled up in little piles here, and the pieces of a broken old shovel lie scattered about the floor. The only exit is to the east.

fields.name: You are in a secret north/south tunnel.
fields.description: The tunnel was probably dug by trolls, as it is so well done. There appears to be a small chamber to the south.

fields.name: You are in a small secret storage room. (N/E)
fields.description: There are doors in the north and east walls. It is rather chilly in here. A heap of old clothing lies on the floor.

fields.name: You are in a small secret east room. (W)
fields.description: You are in a small secret room to the east of another secret room. This was a storage room of some sort.

fields.name: You are in a deep buried passage. (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are in an east/west tunnel that was buried ages ago by a cave in. It is very dark and still in here. You can see a chamber to the west. The north wall is so dark it could be a doorway.

fields.name: You are in a dark tomb. (S)
fields.description: You are in a tomb of some kind. There is a large coffin in here that has been wax sealed. The floor, made up of blocks of granite, was never finished, so there are a few patches of dirt showing through. The only exit is south.

fields.name: You are in a still west chamber. (E)
fields.description: There are signs of a great battle in here. On the walls are gashes into the stone from some mighty weapon, and there are tables and chairs that have been neatly sliced in two.

fields.name: You are outside the caves to the south. (N/E)
fields.description: You are outside the caves, on the south side of the mountain. There is a cliff to the south and a stone wall west. The road into town goes down from the mountain to the east.

fields.name: You are in a secret north/south tunnel. (N/S)
fields.description: The walls are very rough, cold and hard. There is a large chamber to the south. A faint music seems to flow through the hallway and sounds like funeral music.

fields.name: You are in a large temple. (N)
fields.description: You are in a large room that seems to be serving as some kind of a temple. The music is louder here, but you can't tell where it comes from. The exit is north. There is a crude stone altar by the south wall.

fields.name: You are in a hidden organist room. (N)
fields.description: You have entered a hidden room where the organist plays. There is a large walnut organ with huge pipes in the corner. It is so large that it had to be assembled here in this room. North is the exit.

fields.name: You are in a hidden underwater tunnel. (E/W)
fields.description: This dark tunnel was hidden from view by an overhanging rock. The tunnel is too dark to see much in, but you can feel your way east and west.

fields.name: You are at the west end of an underwater tunnel. (E/U)
fields.description: You are at the western end of the underwater tunnel. The tunnel is too dark to see in but you can feel your way along to the east. The tunnel also appears to lead upward.

fields.name: You are in a vertical underwater shaft. (U/D)
fields.description: This shaft is lined with moss and is very slick to the touch. You may swim up or down.

fields.name: You are at the surface of a pool. (U/D)
fields.description: You have reached the surface of the pool and are now looking around a very small chamber. There is a ledge here that will allow you to get up out of the water.

fields.name: You are in a small room with a pool. (D)
fields.description: You are in a very small room standing on the west side of a pool. Apparently the only way out of this room is back down into the pool. The air is very damp here; water dribbles down a straight vertical crack in the west wall.

fields.name: You are in a dimly lit east/west tunnel. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: The tunnel echoes with your footsteps. In the dim light, you can just make out doors to the north and south. There is a large cavern to the east and the tunnel disappears into darkness to the west.

fields.name: You are in a stone tunnel. (E/W)
fields.description: You are in a tunnel of stone running to the west and east. The rock is hard with flecks of pyrite glittering in the light.

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel.
fields.description: You are in a stone tunnel running east and west. The sparkling pyrite flecks in the walls give the tunnel an eerie quality.

fields.name: You are in a panelled study. (S)
fields.description: You are in a study with wood panels on the walls. The room looks out of place in this area of the caverns. There are shelves that once held hundreds of books, but there are none now. You notice a panel on the west wall that looks out of place...

fields.name: You are in a laboratory. (N)
fields.description: You are in a crude laboratory. The room's walls are smooth stone, while the heavy tables in the room are filled with old brews that evaporated long ago. You notice a particularly large table attached to the south wall...

fields.name: You are in a small stone chamber. (S)
fields.description: You are in a small stone chamber with a door to the south. The room is rather plain. If there was ever any furniture in here it is long gone now. Dust and cobwebs cover the room.

fields.name: dwarf sword
fields.description: You see a well made dwarf sword here.

fields.name: dwarf sword#
fields.description: You see a shiny dwarf-made sword.

fields.name: diamond
fields.description: You see a very large diamond!

fields.name: miner's pick
fields.description: You see an old, well-used miners pick lying on the ground here.

fields.name: battle axe
fields.description: You see a very well-made battle axe.

fields.name: broadsword
fields.description: You see an old broadsword.

fields.name: chest
fields.description: You see an old chest sitting here. When you first entered the room, it seemed to be moving, but it must have been a trick of the light, or your imagination...

fields.name: diamond necklace
fields.description: You see a beautiful diamond necklace.

fields.name: rusty axe
fields.description: You see an old rusty axe.

fields.name: rusty sword
fields.description: You see an old rusty sword.

fields.name: silver box
fields.description: You see a small silver box, ornately decorated.

fields.name: letter
fields.description: You see a letter rolled up like a scroll and tied by a ribbon.

fields.name: old skull
fields.description: You found an old skull. It looks like it might have come from a troll or ogre. The jaw looks like it would still OPEN.

fields.name: lump of gold
fields.description: You have found a large lump of gold. It looks like it was molten when the poor man belonging to the skull was forced to swallow it.

fields.name: satchel
fields.description: You see a small leather satchel. It is very dirty and in very poor condition.

fields.name: jewels
fields.description: You have found a very large pile of rubies, emeralds and diamonds. They are no doubt the loot of some long dead gang of thieves.

fields.name: giant clam
fields.description: There is a giant clam sitting on a ledge in the crevice here. It looks like it is a hundred years old!

fields.name: giant pearl
fields.description: You have found a giant black pearl!

fields.name: golden amulet
fields.description: You see a beautiful golden amulet.

fields.name: diamond ring
fields.description: You see a flashy diamond ring lying on a chest in here.

fields.name: pearl handled comb
fields.description: You see an exquisite pearl handled comb lying on the bureau.

fields.name: treasure
fields.description: You see a large chest filled with gold, jewelry, coins and precious stones. There is no lid on the chest.

fields.name: large spiked club
fields.description: You see the large spiked club of Gromish

fields.name: crate
fields.description: You see an old wooden crate covered with dirt.

fields.name: Hellsblade
fields.description: You see the magnificent Hellsblade. It twitches absently in your hand, much as a cat's tail moves. Fine gold engraving is visible on the blade that pulses with a faint glow.

fields.name: skeleton key
fields.description: You see a large skeleton key.

fields.name: torch
fields.description: In a holder on the wall, you see a torch with a heavy wooden hand grip.

fields.name: old sword
fields.description: You see an old, but still useful, sword sticking in the ground here.

fields.name: chest of drawers
fields.description: You see a large chest of drawers. There are four drawers in the chest.

fields.name: lump of dung
fields.description: You see a lump of bat dung that has a small patch of golden metal showing. It looks like it could be broken OPEN, as it is dried and cracked.

fields.name: mounted heads
fields.description: You see some heads mounted on the wall. One is a rhino, one is a moose and one is a bear. They have hinged jaws that you could OPEN.

fields.name: bag of gold coins
fields.description: You see a fairly sizable bag of gold coins. They were hidden inside one of the drawers.

fields.name: large ruby
fields.description: You found a large ruby hidden in one of the heads!

fields.name: cabinet
fields.description: You see a large wooden cabinet with very strong doors. The wizard uses it to store any important magical items that he might have.

fields.name: magic potion
fields.description: You see a goblet of some kind of magic potion. The wizard drank some of it when you came in. There is still some left in the bottom of the goblet.

fields.name: food pills
fields.description: You see a small bottle labeled "FOOD PILLS". There is a note on the bottle: "Warning! Highly concentrated!"

fields.name: paper bag
fields.description: You see an old wrinkled paper bag that has been clasped around a bottle.

fields.name: Crown Royale
fields.description: You see a bottle of very expensive booze. This must have been a rather wealthy old wino! It is a bottle of Crown Royale Canadian Whiskey, Special Reserve.

fields.name: beef jerky
fields.description: You see a large piece of beef jerky.

fields.name: tomato
fields.description: You see a delicious looking tomato.

fields.name: locket
fields.description: You see a beautiful gold locket on a gold chain.

fields.name: Claymore
fields.description: You see a large, two-handed Scottish sword called a Claymore. It appears to be in good condition.

fields.name: crown
fields.description: You see a very elegant looking crown! It needs a bit of cleaning up, but it should bring a very good price from the merchants.

fields.name: small key
fields.description: You see a small silver key.

fields.name: gold coins
fields.description: You spy a bunch of gold coins hidden in the corner with a light layer of dirt covering them. There are about 200 of them here.

fields.name: ruby pendant
fields.description: You see a beautiful ruby pendant. It is somewhat dirty from being buried, but it should clean up very well.

fields.name: lamp oil
fields.description: You see an old dusty bottle of lamp and lantern oil. It is propped up in the corner of the room.

fields.name: cutlass
fields.description: You see the cutlass of Gorgan Toad.

fields.name: gold watch
fields.description: The slime monster dropped a gold watch that was clasped in his paw. He must have pulled it off of some adventurer that he once fought.

fields.name: gold bars
fields.description: There are a few gold bars in here. They were hidden under some old clothing.

fields.name: trunk
fields.description: You see an old black trunk. It is rather shabby looking.

fields.name: golden axe
fields.description: You see a beautiful golden axe. It has a large ruby at the end of its handle, and appears to be extremely valuable.

fields.name: gold nuggets
fields.description: You see some gold nuggets sitting on a shelf.

fields.name: old coffin
fields.description: You see an old black coffin. It is very dusty and is sealed with wax.

fields.name: golden box
fields.description: You see a fantastic golden box with very intricate designs all over it. There is a small key hole in the front. The box is over two feet wide and must be very heavy.

fields.name: sacred scabbard
fields.description: You see a beautiful scabbard for a sword. It seems to radiate an aura of great holiness. This is the sacred scabbard! It is the only way to control the evil Hellsblade.

fields.name: Holy Gauntlets
fields.description: You see some armored gloves that have been blessed by the High Priest of the Great Temple of Antiok.

fields.name: gold key
fields.description: You see a small golden key. It is very dirty, but looks like it should work.

fields.name: diary
fields.description: You have found an old diary tucked away in a small nook in the corner. It seems to be an extremely old diary. It is very dusty and beat up. The title on the cover says, "JOHN'S DIARY". Most of the pages have been torn out.

fields.name: paper
fields.description: You see an old yellowed paper that is all dusty and faded. It was half buried in the sand in here. It appears to be a fragment of a page that was torn from a book.

fields.name: scratches on wall
fields.description: There are some scratches on the wall. You could probably READ them.

fields.name: scrap of parchment
fields.description: You see a small scrap of parchment. It is very old and dusty.

fields.name: slab
fields.description: The tunnel is not completely blocked! A single large slab of rock nearly covers a hole to the tunnel beyond.

fields.name: door leading west
fields.description: There is a door on the west wall that is chained and locked shut. On the door is written "DANGER!". The chain on the door is held fast by a large padlock.

fields.name: a secret passage south
fields.synonyms: crude stone altar,stone altar,crude altar,altar,south wall,wall
fields.description: The stone altar covers much of the south wall. There appear to be concealed hinges set into one panel of the altar's base. You swing it open and a secret passage is revealed!

fields.name: a secret door west
fields.synonyms: straight vertical crack,straight crack,vertical crack,crack,west wall,wall,water,dribbles
fields.description: You discover a secret door cunningly concealed among the cracks in the wall!

fields.name: a secret passage west
fields.synonyms: panel on the west wall,west wall,west panel,panel,wall
fields.description: You discover a sliding panel in the west wall!

fields.name: a secret door south
fields.synonyms: particularly large table,large table,table,south wall,wall,south table
fields.description: Although the tables appear to be built into the wall, one table is attached to the south wall with heavy iron hinges on the underside. When you swing the table up a secret door is revealed!

fields.name: lantern
fields.description: You see an old lantern. Even though it is very dusty and has a cracked glass it appears to be serviceable.

fields.name: overhang
fields.description: There is a tunnel running west beneath the overhang!

fields.name: a north doorway to the Main Hall
fields.description: A large slab of rock to the north slides open and you see a magic path that will take you back to the Main Hall!

fields.text:
Dear Elizabeth,

Here is a token of my devotion to you. I know you don't want me sending you such expensive jewelry, but I found this in a small jewelry shop on the coast and I knew it would be just perfect for you. Please put it in a safe place when you are not wearing it around your very lovely neck.

Love, John

Some time after you left the cave, you happened to be passing through this area again. As you were camping one evening, a stranger stepped into the circle of firelight. With a start, you recognized the sword he was carrying! -- R.I.P.
Your body is crushed by the pressure of the water!

Only a few days later, you discovered to your horror that the sacred scabbard had been stolen from your room. You lost no time heading for distant parts, but as you came around a corner, you heard a familiar eerie song! -- R.I.P.

After you left the caves, the power and influence of the Hellsblade continued to increase, and you went on a wild killing spree. You were eventually hunted down by the mightiest warriors in the land and slain! -- R.I.P.

"I've finally managed to defeat the demon with the sword. The sword was placed in a golden box and the key buried in the demon's resting place. The gauntlets are most helpful when handling the blade. I have left the Golden Guardian to stop anyone from trying to run off with it. I cannot imagine how any normal mortal is going to be able to use the Hellsblade. But just in case, I have cast a spell on the guardian and he will allow someone to have the sword if they say that name that is closest to my heart. I have chosen this word because I will never forget it as long as I have life. I will live out the rest of my days here since the cursed blade has taken my love from me forever."
...und that it has little power against blessed objects, and so I have wrought various means to control and inhibit it. Though they are not perfect, the Guardian will prevent ordina...
The scratches are crude but seem to read "CHRIST O FOR".
You feel a strange hand on your shoulder restraining you and hear a gentle voice say, "Your work here is not quite done my friend..."

As you start to leave the caves, a very strong but invisible hand grips you on the shoulder and restrains you. Then you hear an eerie voice say, "You are not quite done, my friend..." and you find that you can't leave!
As you leave, the Guardian speaks to you, "The world is not yet safe!"
If you went any deeper, you would be crushed by the pressure of the water!
There doesn't seem to be anything written on it at all.
The Hellsblade leaps eagerly out of the sacred scabbard and into your hands!

As you return the key to the Guardian, he locks the Hellsblade back up in the box and resumes his position. The evil of the Hellsblade is now locked safely away and you are free of its curse. Good job!
As soon as you pry open the lid of the coffin, a huge, scary demon jumps out at you!

fields.name: Bat
fields.description: A large bat has awakened and is diving at you. It seems very vicious and might be a vampire!

fields.name: Bat2
fields.description: You see a bat swooping down as it tries to attack you.

fields.name: Bat3
fields.description: You see another bat, also flittering about and diving.

fields.name: Slime Monster
fields.description: Some of the slime moves in a menacing manner. It must be some kind of mutated life form growing from the slime in here.

fields.name: Wino
fields.description: You see an old wino, sitting in the corner in the dark. He is holding a paper bag with a bottle in it.

fields.name: Hoagie
fields.description: You see a dwarf sitting in here chewing on some beef jerky or something.

fields.name: Boagie
fields.description: You see another dwarf sitting here and eating a tomato.

fields.name: Wolf
fields.description: There is a grey wolf in here making a low growling noise.

fields.name: Grizzly Bear
fields.description: You see a very large grizzly bear here. It is standing on its hind legs and walking in your direction.

fields.name: Black Dragon
fields.description: You see a fierce black dragon with glowing gold eyes. You did not see him when he was sleeping in the corner, but you woke him up when you started nosing around the room. He doesn't like being awakened!

fields.name: Zombie
fields.description: You see a walking dead man. He is pale, and is walking about aimlessly.

fields.name: Rattlesnake
fields.description: You see a very large rattlesnake. It is about 12 feet long and 8 inches thick; it is rattling its tail and is poised to strike!

fields.name: Sodloth
fields.description: You see a mighty warrior in full dress scale armour. He is holding a large axe and is glaring at you.

fields.name: Sunnun
fields.description: You see a beautiful maiden in pink robes and satin slippers. She appears to be friendly.

fields.name: Reshkiv
fields.description: You see a large burly man just finishing a 24 pound turkey. He casts its carcass onto the floor, and stands to meet you. You cannot tell whether he is friendly.

fields.name: Wizard
fields.description: You see a man in a wizard's frock, adding a pinch of something to one of his many potions. When he sees you, he quickly drinks some of it and stands to confront you.

fields.name: Lime Monster
fields.description: You see a moving stalagmite and realize it must be some kind of lime monster. It is moving about menacingly.

fields.name: Caveman
fields.description: You see a caveman crouching in the dark corner of the room.

fields.name: Puglen
fields.description: You see an orc with the name "Puglen" burned into his cheap leather armour. He grabs his club as you enter, and looks around.

fields.name: Gimkog
fields.description: You see another orc with a name burned into his leather armour: "Gimkog".

fields.name: Alligator
fields.description: You see a very large alligator with a hungry look in his beady little eyes.

fields.name: Damlin
fields.description: You see a young man in standard leather armour and a small shield. He says his name is Damlin of York, and that he is an adventurer.

fields.name: Gromish
fields.description: You see a wicked looking troll with thick, padded fur armour. He speaks in the Common tongue for you: "I am Gromish and you are  D E A D!"

fields.name: Black Demon
fields.description: You see a very vicious, black-skinned demon of some sort. He is snarling and foaming at the mouth, and uttering foul language. Not the sort you'd have home for dinner.

fields.name: Old Hermit
fields.description: You see a very old hermit lying here in the corner. When you walk in, you awaken him. He says this is his station and he will defend it.

fields.name: Packrat
fields.description: You see a large packrat. It is very fond of shiny, glittering objects.

fields.name: Guard
fields.description: You see a fat, dumpy-looking guard asleep in a chair in the corner of the room. He is probably a guard for the mistress.

fields.name: Gorgan Toad
fields.description: You see a mean looking man dressed like a typical pirate. He has a patch over one eye, and is carrying a cutlass. He stands and faces you as you enter, and says, "What - another nosy adventurer? Old Gorgan Toad don't need ye!"

fields.name: Habstash
fields.description: You see a vicious looking troll. As you entered, he had his back turned, and thought you were Gromish. Now he sees you, and he says, "Who are you? What have you done to Gromish? Habstash will kill you!"

fields.name: Barbus
fields.description: A large muscular demon lunges from the coffin! In a throaty, rasping noise, he says that his name is Barbus, assistant to Asmodeus, the devil supreme. He thanks you for freeing him, and starts to tear your face off.

fields.name: Guardian
fields.description: You see a gleaming, golden-skinned man of metal. He eyes you absently as you move about the room, but does not speak or move.

fields.question: How do I keep the Hellsblade from killing everybody?
How can I control the Hellsblade?
Where can I find a source of light?
How do I open the padlocked door?
How do I light the lantern?
How do I get rid of the Hellsblade?
How do I open the golden box?

fields.answer: It will only attack on its own if it is your READY weapon and you haven't found a way to control it. When you start the game it is your READY weapon. READY something else to keep it from wasting everybody...
But it is a REALLY good weapon (10D10) so you should find a way to control it so that you can use it as your READY weapon.
You must find the Holy Gauntlets and WEAR them.
There are two light sources, a torch near the entrance and a lantern you'll find later in the game. You'll need some fuel for the lantern, so keep an eye out...
From the room you start in go: W, W, W, S, S, S, S, S, EXAMINE ALTAR, S.
From the room that it is in: N, N, N, N, EXAMINE PANEL, W, ATTACK CRATE, REMOVE KEY FROM CRATE. Now go back and OPEN DOOR.
Keep diving down, then head west and swim back up and you should come to a room with a lantern.
PUT LAMP OIL INTO LANTERN. (The lamp oil can be found by going W, W, N from the room that you start in.)

You must find the room with the Guardian and the golden box, then: SAY ELIZABETH, OPEN GOLDEN BOX, REMOVE SCABBARD FROM GOLDEN BOX, PUT HELLSBLADE INTO SCABBARD, PUT SCABBARD INTO GOLDEN BOX, GIVE GOLD KEY TO GUARDIAN.
Find the miner's pick and go to the room where you find the lantern. Then: EXAMINE CRACK, W, USE PICK (smashes stone slab), W, W.
First of all you must SAY ELIZABETH before the Guardian will let you, then you need the gold key. If you don't have the gold key, go E, N, OPEN COFFIN, and kill the demon (he has it).
Note: The following will give you the fastest steps to get rid of the Hellsblade, ignoring the rest of the adventure.

From the start: W, GET TORCH, LIGHT TORCH, W, N, GET LAMP OIL, S, W, S, S, S, S, S, EXAMINE ALTAR, S, GET HOLY GAUNTLETS, WEAR HOLY GAUNTLETS, N, N, N, E, E, E, N, N, GET PICK, S, S, W, W, W, W, W, N, W, D, D, D, W, W, U, U, U, GET LANTERN, PUT OIL INTO LANTERN...

...LIGHT LANTERN, EXAMINE CRACK, W, USE PICK, W, N, OPEN COFFIN, (kill the demon), GET KEY, S, W, SAY ELIZABETH, OPEN BOX, REMOVE SCABBARD FROM BOX, PUT HELLSBLADE INTO SCABBARD, PUT SCABBARD INTO BOX, GIVE KEY TO GUARDIAN.
